Class Player

java.lang.Object
User
Player
public class Player
extends User
A class that inherits User, and allows player to book playgrounds and do player functionalities.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class User

    account, email, firstName, lastName, password, phoneNumber, username

    • bookPlayground

      public boolean bookPlayground​(Playground playground, TimeSlot timeSlot)
      Books a playground in a specific time slot a transfer the booking cost from player's account to playground owner's account
      Parameters:
      playground - the playground to be booked
      timeSlot - the slot that will be booked from the playground
      Returns:
      true if the booking is done successfully, otherwise false
